author.name: Cory Ondrejka
author.email: cory dot ondrejka at gmail dot com

entry.title: trying facebook connect
entry.content: Given that most folks I know already use Facebook, why not use Facebook connect for comments? Let’s see if this works…

entry.title: updating jekyll and disqus
entry.content: Updated jekyll and that fixed the related posts issue. Dropped the Disqus generic instructions in and voila!

entry.title: formatting and such
entry.content: Starting from scratch on design, as opposed to a Blogger template, feels very different. Trying to do a little bit at a time and see where it leads.

entry.title: more playing around
entry.content: Textile is barfing in the related posts calculation. Wonder if it is due to having less than 3 posts?

entry.title: moving blog to github
entry.content:
After a little over a year on Blogger, the incredible quantity of comment spam has exceeded my threshold of annoyance. So, it is with a mixture of trepidation and excitement that I decided to start playing around with hosting on GitHub and Jekyll.

Expect many changes as I master Liquid and Textile.
